definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Passengers for Newport and Cardiff change at Bristol Parkway.
sentences.chinese: 前往新港和加的夫的旅客请在布里斯托大道换车。

sentences.english: Belinda's family in Cardiff have been too upset to speak.
sentences.chinese: 贝琳达在加的夫的家人悲伤得无以言语。

sentences.english: Cardiff is on the south coast of Wales .
sentences.chinese: 加的夫位于威尔士的南海岸。

definition: Manchester/also written 曼徹斯特|曼彻斯特
Bristol port city in southwest England
Aberdeen (city on east coast of Scotland)
Bradford, city in West Yorkshire, England
Coventry city in West Midlands 西米德蘭茲|西米德兰兹[Xi1 mi3 de2 lan2 zi1], UK
